channel.title: Interface Help!

item.title: Interface Help!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:445485”]70 = x coordinate on the interface
105 = y coordinate on the interface
3 = the index of the “child” in the “children” array.[/quote]
Thanks a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Help!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

70 = x coordinate on the interface
105 = y coordinate on the interface
3 = the index of the “child” in the “children” array.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Help!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

I know this is in the wrong section, I posted in client help, and I have gotten a huge 12 views (being sarcastic, 10 of the 12 are me reloading page)
Base: Shards - CreativeScape

I’m changing the login (Welcome Back) interface.

addText(26154, "Welcome Back!", TDA, 2, 0xff9933); addText(26155, "Latest Server Update:", TDA, 3, 0xff9933); addText(26156, "", TDA, 1, 0xff9933); addText(26157, "Last connected from:", TDA, 2, 0xff9933); setBounds(26154, 70, 105, 3, Interface); setBounds(26155, 81, 125, 4, Interface); setBounds(26156, 90, 145, 5, Interface); setBounds(26157, 50, 280, 6, Interface);
I need to make that start higher then it is currently.
What I think all this means is; the addText is what shows (obviously), but the setBounds is where the addText sits in the interface.

I just need to know what the bold numbers represent. And how I would go about changing it.

setBounds(26154, [b]70, 105, 3[/b], Interface);

Picture of what it looks like now.

Read full topic
